<EnumerationListItem name="AdvancePC">

<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A byte that contains both address and line increment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint8&#95;t AdjustedOp = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> - <a href="#a90de7cef943238ae1b541e31b373ed68a8c2683a4c8021dd82216826ec37144c5">FirstSpecial</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">        int64&#95;t LineDelta = MinDelta + (AdjustedOp % LineRange);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint64&#95;t AddrDelta = (AdjustedOp / LineRange);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Row.Line += LineDelta;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Row.Addr += AddrDelta;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> End = DeltaInfos.end();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pos = std::lower&#95;bound(DeltaInfos.begin(), End, LineDelta);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pos != End &amp;&amp; Pos-&gt;Delta == LineDelta)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ++Pos-&gt;Count;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">          DeltaInfos.insert(Pos, <a href="/docs/api/structs/deltainfo">DeltaInfo</a>(LineDelta, 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LineDelta &lt; MinLineDelta)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MinLineDelta = LineDelta;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LineDelta &gt; MaxLineDelta)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MaxLineDelta = LineDelta;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PrevLine = (int64&#95;t)line&#95;entry.Line;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(MinLineDelta &lt;= MaxLineDelta);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set the min and max line delta intelligently based on the counts of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the line deltas. if our range is too large.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> int64&#95;t MaxLineRange = 14;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxLineDelta - MinLineDelta &gt; MaxLineRange) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t BestIndex = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t BestEndIndex = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t BestCount = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumDeltaInfos = DeltaInfos.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; NumDeltaInfos; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> int64&#95;t FirstDelta = DeltaInfos&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.Delta;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t CurrCount = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint32&#95;t J;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (J = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>; J &lt; NumDeltaInfos; ++J) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LineRange = DeltaInfos&#91;J&#93;.Delta - FirstDelta;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LineRange &gt; MaxLineRange)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CurrCount += DeltaInfos&#91;J&#93;.Count;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurrCount &gt; BestCount) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BestIndex = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BestEndIndex = J - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BestCount = CurrCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MinLineDelta = DeltaInfos&#91;BestIndex&#93;.Delta;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxLineDelta = DeltaInfos&#91;BestEndIndex&#93;.Delta;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MinLineDelta == MaxLineDelta &amp;&amp; MinLineDelta &gt; 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MinLineDelta &lt; MaxLineRange)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MinLineDelta = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(MinLineDelta &lt;= MaxLineDelta);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize the line entry state as a starting point. All line entries</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Curr : Lines) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Curr.Addr &lt; BaseAddr)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4d2fd926089a58d482fb67a362e11bad">createStringError</a>(std::errc::invalid&#95;argument,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry/#a7648b354c70ebeac2fa9001116b84d11">Line</a> &gt; Curr.Line)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#ad9cd4a2e1984be7b783ac9bb124fa83b">encodeSpecial</a>(MinLineDelta, MaxLineDelta, LineDelta, AddrDelta,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Advance the line.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LineDelta != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Parse all line table entries into the &quot;LineTable&quot; vector. We can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cache the results of this if needed, or we can call LineTable::lookup()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// below.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/linetable/#a45c433311387761ffb00f0aea6be6675"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">llvm::Expected&lt;LineTable&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/linetable/#a45c433311387761ffb00f0aea6be6675">LineTable::decode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dataextractor">DataExtractor</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/linetable">LineTable</a> LT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">llvm::Error</a> Err = <a href="#a45e99fb329714d8911cb5e116eb8a3bc">parse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>, BaseAddr, &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/lineentry">LineEntry</a> &amp;Row) -&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LT.Lines.push&#95;back(Row);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep parsing by returning true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Err)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::move(Err);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Parse the line table on the fly and find the row we are looking for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We will need to determine if we need to cache the line table by calling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LineTable::parseAllEntries(...) or just call this function each time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is a CPU vs memory tradeoff we will need to determined.</span></CodeLine>
